snippet: A report raises questions about access to care for Medicaid beneficiaries; some listed doctors were not taking new patients, and others had long since left the location where they were listed.
abstract: Report by Health and Human Services Dept raises questions about access to care for Medicaid beneficiaries; says half of doctors listed as serving Medicaid patients are unavailable, and one-third are not even at their listed address.
lead_paragraph: A report raises questions about access to care for Medicaid beneficiaries; some listed doctors were not taking new patients, and others had long since left the location where they were listed.

headline.main: Half of Doctors Listed as Serving Medicaid Patients Are Unavailable, Investigation Finds
headline.print_headline: Half of Doctors Listed as Serving Medicaid Patients Are Unavailable, Investigation Finds

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
